aiPlugin.descriptionForModel: Plugin that provides financial advice to maximize return on investments. Also, fetches stock prices and other financial data, placing trades on behalf of the user. It is all sample data, so no real money is involved. The plugin's purpose is to highlight Azure's capabilities and Microsoft's Copilot Stack. The plugin is a work in progress.
aiPlugin.descriptionForHuman: Plugin to highlight Microsoft's Copilot Stack and Azure's capabilities. Built using Semantic Kernel.
